body:
T3ll us how you became popular on Avicus!

  • Don't Boast
  • Don't make fun of others
  • Respect
  • If you don't believe you're popular, tell us how you plan to be!
  • This thread is not meant to make others feel bad
  • Chicken tastes great.
body_tagged:

replies.body:
So u want to be "popular"?
For me the popularist (if that word exist) doesn't exist. Is just an invention of the humanity to make people better than others. This can be seen, for example, on Ranks. If a player got a thing that says he did something more important (like donating) to the server he gets more attentions and then become "popular". For me, everyone is popular only because we are humans ='3

Now, going more on topic:
You don't need to be "popular" if you are already =3
You are very "popular" on forums!
replies.body_tagged:

I got noticed for a while, then after that people didn't really care.

replies.body:
Well,
I made a Nexus map that's in the rots
I'm active on the forums
I'm a staff member.
I have a YouTube channel (Not anything big really, I only have 130 subs and I rarely see people recognize me because of it).

I don't think that I'm really popular though, just well known.

replies.body:
- I used to be staff
- I was one of the few female moderators, in my time (When I first became mod, there was only 3-4)
- My name causes confusion^
- For a short amount of time, I had dealt the most punishments (or maybe second most, not 100% sure), out of the entire staff team (that was still around). I slowly got burnt out, thus I slowed down, lost that position, and eventually left. (Some of you may remember back when I filled up 2-3 pages of kicks in my first few hours.. in it's time, it was legendary.. Kinda).
-Being a major Mod Tryhard, on several different networks.
- I helped create a couple threads (2-3), that caused a lot of controversy. 

I can't say that I am the most popular, but I do get a hello on every Nebula match I go on. xD
replies.body_tagged:
- I used to be staff
- I was one of the few female moderators, in my time (When I first became mod, there was only 3-4)

I slowly got burnt out, thus I slowed down, lost that position, and eventually left. (Some of you may remember back when I filled up 2-3 pages of kicks in my first few hours.. in it's time, it was legendary.. Kinda).
-Being a major Mod Tryhard, on several different networks.
- I helped create a couple threads (2-3), that caused a lot of controversy. 

I can't say that I am the most popular, but I do get a hello on every Nebula match I go on. xD
